mapper.insert: insert into wb2video_process (id, teacher_id, video_url, status, create_time, update_time, wb_id) values (#{id}, #{teacherId}, #{videoUrl}, #{status}, now(), now(), #{wbId})
mapper.update: update wb2video_process set teacher_id = #{teacherId}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, status = #{status}, update_time = now(), wb_id = #{wbId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, teacher_id, video_url, status, create_time, update_time, wb_id from wb2video_process
select id, teacher_id, video_url, status, create_time, update_time, wb_id from wb2video_process where wb_id = #{wbId} limit 1
